#Text= Bolin says : " How are we supposed to fight an entire army , a mecha giant , and that crazy weapon ?

column1: #Text=" Asami says : " We ca n't fight it , but maybe we can cripple it .
#Text=Zhu Li , when you were spying on Kuvira , did you learn anything about that metal monster ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " I had no idea they were even building it .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Guess Baatar Jr. is a better inventor than I thought .
#Text=Do n't tell him I said that .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's it !
#Text=Baatar Jr. built it , he 'll know how to take it down !
#Text=I say we capture him , and get him to talk .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Hmm ... " Korra says : " I know it 's a long shot , but it 's the only chance we have , and if we do n't ... " Tenzin says : " Korra , I 'm in .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 'll need a stealth team of airbenders to get in and out of Baatar 's airship unnoticed .
#Text=Tenzin , Bumi , Jinora , Kai , let 's get moving .
#Text=" Meelo says : " What about me ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Sorry , buddy .
#Text=This mission counts on everyone being as silent as possible - - and your farts are just too much of a wild card .
#Text=" Meelo says : " I can be quiet !
#Text=Okay , point taken .
#Text="
